dct_title_s: Antiqvæ İerusalem vera icnographia ad sacræ lectionis præ cipve et aliarvm de illa vrbe historiar
dct_alternative_sm: Antiquae Jerusalem vera icnographia ad sacrae lectionis prae cipue et aliarum de illa urbe historiar
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Appears in Montanus' Benedictus, Antiquitatum Judaicarum, 1593.
